intro: Palicourea graciliflora, commonly known as the slender-flowered palicourea, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a slightly serrated edge. Palicourea graciliflora is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and undergrowth.
